name: Hive Mind Robotics
description: Hive Mind Robotics is a real-time, cooperative game with a unique spin on the movement mechanics. You play as four escaped experimental robot who is trying to find a way to get home. You will encounter many dangerous obstacles, solving many unique puzzles, and your team synergy will be put to the test. Will, you escaped? or will you go back into the simulation? The choice is yours. The game is recommended to play with 2-4 players at 1920 x 1080 screen resolution and it's not recommended to play alone. [Be advise the game can only be played using Ps4 or Xbox controller and the coop is offline only] Trust your teammate, communicate, coordinate, and you shall dominate.
